price: Wani Manzo* daga Allah, yana karatun wasu takardu masu tsarki.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ
footnotes: * Shi ne Muhammadu, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi, dõmin bãbu wanda ya dãce da abin da ke cikin littafansu sai shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
